sql_init_queries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Listings (id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT NOT NULL, description TEXT NOT NULL, isbn TEXT NOT NULL, price DECIMAL(13,4) NOT NULL, category TEXT NOT NULL, seller TEXT NOT NULL, listing_password TEXT NOT NULL, status TEXT NOT NULL, buyer TEXT, billing_info TEXT, shipping_info TEXT)

sql_queries.select_listing_public: SELECT id,title,description,isbn,price,category,seller FROM Listings WHERE id=? LIMIT 1
sql_queries.create_listing: INSERT INTO Listings (title, description, isbn, price, category, seller, listing_password, status) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
sql_queries.search_listings: SELECT * FROM Listings WHERE title LIKE '%book%' OR description LIKE '%?%' OR isbn LIKE '%?%'
